title: How to Create and Invite Others to a Group Chat in WhatsApp

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp app.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp app. If you don't already have it, WhatsApp for iPhone is free to download from the App Store . [1] X Research source If you can't find WhatsApp on your iPhone, swipe down from the middle of the screen and type "WhatsApp" into the ensuing search bar. You should see WhatsApp's icon pop up at the top of this menu. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the "Chats" option to open your chat history.
steps.content: Tap the "Chats" option to open your chat history. This is in the toolbar at the bottom of the screen. [3] X Research source If WhatsApp opens to your last-used chat, you'll need to tap the "Chats" option in the top left corner to return to the Chats menu.

steps.title: Tap +.
steps.content: Tap + . This is in the top-right corner. You will need to have at least one chat in your Chats menu before you can create a group; if you've only just installed WhatsApp, simply send a one-word chat to a contact in order to activate the "New Group" option.

steps.title: Tap New Group.
steps.content: Tap New Group . This is at the top.

steps.title: Select contacts and tap Next.
steps.content: Select contacts and tap Next . Tap the contacts from the list. If you're trying to invite a contact that doesn't have a WhatsApp account, you'll need to invite them via SMS. You can have up to 1024 members in one group.

steps.title: Enter group details.
steps.content: Enter group details. You can add a group name and group icon. You can also change the group settings. The group name must be under 100 characters. To add a group icon, tap the camera icon and select Take Photo , Choose Photo , Emoji & Stickers , or Search Web . Tap Disappearing messages to toggle it on. Tap Group permissions to change additional settings.

steps.title: Tap Create.
steps.content: Tap Create . This will create your group.

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp app.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp app. If you don't have WhatsApp for Android yet, it's free to download from the Google Play Store . [4] X Research source If you can't locate WhatsApp on your phone, try searching for it using Google's "In App" feature.

steps.title: Tap the "Chats" tab.
steps.content: Tap the "Chats" tab. You'll find this at the bottom of your screen in WhatsApp's toolbar. [5] X Research source If WhatsApp opens to your last-used chat, tap the "Chats" option in the top left corner to view the Chats menu.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . This is in the top-right corner. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap New group.
steps.content: Tap New group . This will prompt you to select members for your group. [7] X Research source You will need to have at least one chat in your Chats menu before you can create a group; if you've only just installed WhatsApp, simply send a one-word chat to a contact in order to activate the "New Group" option.

steps.title: Select contacts and tap Next.
steps.content: Select contacts and tap Next . Tap the contacts from the list. If you're trying to invite a contact that doesn't have a WhatsApp account, you'll need to invite them via SMS. You can have up to 1024 members in one group.

steps.title: Enter group details.
steps.content: Enter group details. You can add a group name and group icon. You can also change the group settings. The group name must be under 100 characters. To add a group icon, tap the camera icon and select Take Photo , Choose Photo , Emoji & Stickers , or Search Web . Tap Disappearing messages to toggle it on. Tap Group permissions to change additional settings.

steps.title: Tap the checkmark when you're finished.
steps.content: Tap the checkmark when you're finished. The group will be created.

steps.title: Tap the "Chats" option.
steps.content: Tap the "Chats" option. This will take you to your Chats menu, where you should see your group name.

steps.title: Tap your group name.
steps.content: Tap your group name. This will open your group's chat.

steps.title: Tap the field at the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Tap the field at the bottom of the screen. This is where you'll type your messages.

steps.title: Type to create a message.
steps.content: Type to create a message. You can send your messages by tapping the arrow button next to the chat field when you're done. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the camera icon to add a photo.
steps.content: Tap the camera icon to add a photo. You can add a photo from your library, or you can take a live photo from within WhatsApp. [9] X Research source Tap the "Send" option in the top right corner of your screen to send your photo.
